title: ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData.D1EndCondition
description: Gets or sets how to specify the spacing of pattern instances in Direction 1 of this linear component pattern feature.
returns: Spacing of pattern instances in Direction 1 as defined in swPatternEndCondition_e
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this property.
For more information, see the
Linear Component Pattern PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
